title: 'We love 'gagging' the children' with art - U.S. DJ Seth Troxler and artist Scooter LaForge
text:
'We love 'gagging' the children' with art - U.S. DJ Seth Troxler and artist Scooter LaForge 7:39pm BST - 01:25 
American creative duo brings LaForge's 'The Odyssey' art exhibition to London, hoping to 'gag' or 'wow' the public.   
American creative duo brings LaForge's 'The Odyssey' art exhibition to London, hoping to 'gag' or 'wow' the public.  //reut.rs/2GrHgqF
